sentences.english: The piece is in one movement divided into three parts.
sentences.chinese: 全曲只有一個樂章而分爲三個部分。

sentences.english: The triumphant orchestration inthe forth movement concludes the symphony in absolute victory.
sentences.chinese: 第四樂章的成功編曲是交響曲在絕對勝利中結束。

sentences.english: And yet the movement is a masterpiece of pattern designing all the time.
sentences.chinese: 莫扎特的這一樂章又自始至終是樂式設計的傑作。

sentences.english: The coda to this last movement is borrowed from two humanists.
sentences.chinese: 哲戈最後樂章得完結部湜引用兩戈忍道主義者得話。

sentences.english: Minor cavity to be a cat soundtrack, elegant and played the folk music of murder.
sentences.chinese: 加以貓腔小調的配樂，優雅又民俗地演奏虐殺的樂章。

sentences.english: Look forward to the year of the monkey you like the rhythm of the music, make a better life.
sentences.chinese: 期待猴年的你像這律動的音樂，湊出生活美好樂章。

sentences.english: The third movement menuetto brings images ofcourtly balls and high tea.
sentences.chinese: 第三樂章的小步舞曲帶來宮廷舞會和高級茶會的景象。

sentences.english: Beethoven String Quartet, Op. 18, No. 2, final Movement.
sentences.chinese: 貝多芬絃樂四重奏，作品18號，第二首，末樂章。

sentences.english: A transitional passage connecting two subjects or movements.
sentences.chinese: 過渡樂節用來聯繫兩個主題或樂章。

sentences.english: All teachers and students gathered together and enjoyed this exquisite music.
sentences.chinese: 全體師生歡聚一堂，共同欣賞這別緻的樂章。

sentences.english: Piece of instrumental music in several movements, usually in chance style.
sentences.chinese: 富舞曲節奏的多樂章器樂曲。

sentences.english: The interaction between the editor and the writer is the gorgeous movement.
sentences.chinese: 編輯與作者的互動是這門藝術的華彩樂章。

sentences.english: The first movement, although expressive, maintains a lightness in thesound.
sentences.chinese: 第一樂章，富有表現力的同時又不失輕盈。

sentences.english: The orchestration in the second movement gives its pastoralsound.
sentences.chinese: 第二樂章的編曲又似一支牧歌。

sentences.english: This movement is the most popular of Beethoven’s Symphony No. 7.
sentences.chinese: 這首樂章是貝多芬《第七號交響曲》中最受歡迎的。

definition: a poem/a composition in verse/fig. epic (compared with historical epic)/the biblical Book of Psalms
part (in multi-part instrumental or choral music), such as the soprano part or bass part
